mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`ACCOUNT`, t1.`CONSUMED`, t1.`DAYS`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`HOURS`, t1.`ID`, t1.`JOIN`, t1.`LEFT`, t1.`LIMITED`, t1.`ORDER`, t1.`ROLE`, t1.`ROOT`, (t1.`DAYS` * t1.`HOURS`) AS `TOTAL`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.account AS `USERNAME` FROM `zt_team` t1 ) t1 where id=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`ACCOUNT`, t1.`CONSUMED`, t1.`DAYS`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`HOURS`, t1.`ID`, t1.`JOIN`, t1.`LEFT`, t1.`LIMITED`, t1.`ORDER`, t1.`ROLE`, t1.`ROOT`, (t1.`DAYS` * t1.`HOURS`) AS `TOTAL`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.account AS `USERNAME` FROM `zt_team` t1 WHERE ( t1.`TYPE` = 'project' )
